info: Rating, 4 stars,  路 1 week ago,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
cleanliness is 5/5.
No doubt of cleanliness.
Flat was well spaced and well ventilation all around the flat.
Peaceful stay for 3 nights.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 April 2024,  路 Stayed with kids
rating_comment:
We had an wonderful stay here. The host was very responsive and helpful. We requested an early check-in and she agreed. Also, free car parking was hassle free.
This apartment has everything you need to stay with family or friends. Every room has nice working AC. Very modern interior and full with kitchen amenities.
The location is very close to Dhanmondi lake and every popular brand showrooms, hospital and restaurants are just in walking distance.
Highly recommend for anyone who wants to stay in Dhaka for a few days.
